```{r import_csv}
# Specify the path to the folder containing CSV files
folder_path <- here::here("Coastal Ocean Polygon")

# Get a list of CSV files in the working directory
csv_files <- list.files(path = folder_path, pattern = "\\.csv$")

# Loop through each CSV file
for (file in csv_files) {
  
  # Extract the name without the extension
  name <- sub("\\.csv$", "", file)
  
  # Read the CSV file and assign it to a variable with the extracted name
  assign(name, read.csv(file))
  
  # Print a message indicating the file has been loaded
  cat("File", file, "has been loaded and assigned to", name, "\n")
}

```
